content: day 4 / 24 a star is born abbreviations chain - chain flo - front loop only difficulty mc - magic_ring blo - back loop only time 15 min slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet material jute half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet hook 3 5 mm written pattern round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet 3 chain 3 x4 double_crochet slip_stitch blo to the first double_crochet 15 double_crochet total note with all of the stitches from round 1 - the magic_ring may not fully close round 2 single_crochet in the same stitch as slip_stitch single_crochet in the chain space half_double_crochet in the chain space chain 3 half_double_crochet and single_crochet in the same chain space single_crochet in the next stitch slip_stitch in the next stitch single_crochet in the next stitch x 4 single_crochet and half_double_crochet in the chain space chain 3 half_double_crochet and single_crochet in the same chain space single_crochet in the next stitch slip_stitch in the next stitch slip_stitch to the first stitch of the round or finish with invisible join cut the yarn weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the star congratulations you finished the 4th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 20 to go
